bibl.title: The Jesus Papyrus.
bibl.note: Concerne notamment P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)).
bibl.seg: THIEDE Carsten Peter and Matthew D'ANCONA, The Jesus Papyrus.
London, Weidenfeld and Nicolson, 1996, 8°, xiv-193 pp. ISBN 0-297-81658-6. £16.99.
Concerne notamment P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)).
C.R. par J.K. Elliott, NT 38 (1996) pp. 393-399. - Stuart R. Pickering, JRH 22 (1998) pp. 104-105.
